system.description: The Ork is incredibly tough and resistant to injury, able to shrug off wounds that would kill lesser beings.
system.benefit: Whenever suffering Blood Loss, only test to avoid death every five rounds, instead of every round. Additionally, can reroll any Toguhness Test to avoid instantly dying due to Critical Damage.

specialAbilities.name: Incredibly Tough
specialAbilities.description: When suffering Blood Loss, only test to avoid death every five rounds instead of every round. Additionally, can reroll any Toughness Test to avoid instantly dying due to Critical Damage.
